summary:
enhanced lighting for dungeons/nights/days
ENB V0.102
descriptionHtml:
There are many ENB configs out there and nothing was matching my taste so far, so I made my own config and have come to the point that it needs to be shared with you.

Based on the config from Boris Vorontsov
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2971
from his ENB V0.102 Release

*** Installation ***
Download the file manually, Nexus Mod Manager doesn\'t place the files in the correct directory

Unzip the content of the file to your Skyrim main directory where the \"TESV.exe\" and \"SkyrimLauncher.exe\" reside.

You\'ll recognize that ENBSeries is working when you see the notes in the left upper corner at the title screen.
Enjoy your magic moments!
***********************

*** Uninstallation ***
Just remove those files from your Skyrim main directory that are also found in my .zip file.
***********************

*** Changelog ***

*** version 1.2 ***
transparent weapons fixed
too bright books fixed
eyebrow colors fixed
weather changes have a bigger impact on lighting now
adjusted contrast
adjusted saturation
wider radius for point lighting
more fog
stronger fire glow
***********************

*** version 1.1 ***
more direct lighting at day
more ambient lighting at day
more point lighting at day
no bloom at day
***********************

*** version 1.0 ***
less day bloom
less reflections
blue sky
better day/night transitions
less blinding sun
stronger sun corona
less lense effects
reduced window lights
less ambient lighting
more point lighting
***********************

Credits to Bethesda Game Studios for The Elder Scroll Series
Credits to Boris Vorontsov for ENBSeries
Credits to the Nexus
author: NoxyGame
